prompt: Image Prompt: Generate an image depicting a radiant, ethereal light emanating from a majestic figure symbolizing God as the first cause of all creation. The figure should exude wisdom and power, surrounded by cosmic elements such as stars and galaxies, illustrating the concept of divine origin and eternal existence. The scene should evoke a sense of awe and transcendence, conveying the idea of God as the primordial source from which all existence flows.
